name: The Little Turtle
description:
Sometimes.. Sometimes I feel like a turtle. I'm not good at fighting. But I can endure. I am good at hiding in my shell.

This game is still in development. Please have a look at the prototype! So far there is no release date :)

Controls
  • Walk with WASD
  • Hide with Shift
  • Talk with Space
  • Escape for Settings
  • Alt+F4 for Exit
Credits
